level.heading: Penalty for violation of subchapter.
level.text: Any person who violates any provision of this subchapter shall upon conviction be fined not more than $300.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-37, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-343.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Construction of Law 10-152: See note to § 3-321.
Effect of dissolution of Sports Commission: See note to § 3-321.
